title: Instant crash and bugsplat upon trying to enter a game
body: Every single time i have tried to enter a game since 5.24 whether it be normal s Aram or a custom game in any of the modes the game crashes and i get a bug splat error someone please help me

replies.body:
Hey Jasterfarian,

It's possible that you might have corrupted game files. Please try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article) and let me know if that resolves the issue.

hey thanks for the info but it didn't work it turns out there may have been some light compatibility issue with that patch idk what it was but as soon as i set compatibility for windows 7 didn't have a problem.
